data.title: 9th Pan Arab Games, 1999 (Jordan)
data.text:
9th Pan Arab Games, 1999 (Jordan) - Details

First Stage Group A 16- 8-99 Jordan 3-0 Qatar Ol. "Al-Hussein Sports City", Amman. 16.8.1999. 23.000 Spectators. Referee: Mr. Gamal Al-Ghandour (Egypt). Scorers: Hassouna Al-Sheikh (76'), Badran Al-Shaqran (79'), Ghanem Hamarsheh (90'). Jordan: Ahmed Abou Nassouh / Mohannad Mahadin, Amjad Al-Taher, Adnan Awad, Haytham Al-Shboul / Faysal Ibrahim, Abdullah Abou-Zama'a (79'. Sufian Abdullah), Hassouna Al-Sheikh, Jamal Abou Abed (57'. Ra'afat Ali) / Mouayyed Salim (60'. Ghanem Hamarsheh), Badran Al-Shaqran. Qatar: Mohamed Eynas / Saoud Fatah, Abdulrahman Al-Kowari, Turki Aman, Mohamed Ziyara / Hamed Moujib, Dahi Al-Noubi, Nabil Anwar (64'. Saoud Al-Kathiri), Ibrahim Salmin / Mubarak Al-Kowari (74'. Ismail Ali), Adel Jaddouh (85'. Meer Gani Al-Zein). 18- 8-99 Palestine 0-2 Jordan Scorer: Abdullah Abou Zama'a (35'; 58'). 20- 8-99 Qatar Ol. 0-1 Palestine Scorer: Abdulraouf Hajjaj (42'). Scorers: Jordan: Badran Al-Shaqran (14'; 67'; 75'), Ali Juma'a (41'). Palestine: Ziad Al-Kurd (90'). Referee: Mr. (Tunisia). Jordan: Mohamed Abou Dawood / Adnan Awad (85'. Oussama Talal), Amjad Al-Taher, Haytham Al-Shboul, Mohannad Mahadin / Faysal Ibrahim, Fa'afat Ali, Abdullah Abou-Zama'a, Ali Juma'a (79'. Sufian Abdullah) / Badran Al-Shaqran, Ghanem Hamarsheh. Palestine: Ismail Al-Khatib / Saeb Jundiyyah, Nader Al-Nims, Mouyin Al-Maghribi (34'. Nader Hajjar), Amjad Helmi / Mohamed Al-Suwayrki, Abdulraouf Hajjaj, Ibrahim Manassri (63'. Ayyad Hajjar), Safwan Al-Madi / Ziad Al-Kurd, Fadi Loutfiyya. 29- 8-99 Iraq 3-1 Libya "Amman International Stadium", 15.000 Spectators. Referee: Mr. Nabil Ayyad (Lebanon). Scorers: Iraq: Habib Ja'afar (3'), Hossam Fawzi (18'), Issam Hamad (32'). Libya: Ahmed Faraj (16'). Iraq: Hashem Khamis / Khaled Sabbar, Ahmed Kazem, Issam Hamad, Radhi Shneishel / Yasser Abdullatif (74'. Abbas Rahim), Habib Ja'afar, Abdulwahhab Abou Al-Heil, Hashem Mohamed / Hossam Fawzi, Razzaq Farhan (86'. Haydar Mahmoud). Libya: Ali Suwaydan / Saleh Bou-Qayida (46'. Toufiq Mohamed), Mahmoud Makhlouf, Yasser Hassan, Omar Al-Maryami / Riyadh Juma'a (71'. Khaled Al-Tabib), Faysal Hassan, Ezzeddine Al-Nasrati, Ahmed Faraj / Tareq Ibrahim, Jihad Al-Montasser (46'. Khaled Hussein). Final [Amman International Stadium, att: 30,000] 31- 8-99 Jordan 4-4 Iraq [aet, 3-1 pen] Referee: Mr. Gamal Al-Ghandour (Egypt). Linesmen: Mr. Younes Hassan (UAE), Mr. Ali Ismail (Qatar). 4th Referee: Mr. Nabil Ayyad (Lebanon). Scorers: Jordan: Abdullah Abou-Zama'a (30' pen.), Badran Al-Shaqran (41'; 70'), Radhi Shneishel (70' own goal). Iraq: Hossam Fawzi (74'; 75' pen.), Haydar Mahmoud (77'), Razzaq Farhan (85'). Penalty shoot-out session: Jordan Iraq Abdullah Abou-Zama'a (1-1) Radhi Shneishel Hassouna Al-Sheikh (missed) (1-1) Hossam Fawzi (missed) Badran Al-Shaqran (2-1) Riyadh Mezher (missed) Sufian Abdullah (3-1) Abbas Abdulrahim (missed) Jordan: Mohamed Abou Dawood / Adnan Awad, Amjad Al-Taher, Haytham Al-Shboul, Oussama Talal / Hassouna Al-Sheikh, Jamal Abou Abed (46'.
